scripts.publish: yarn zip && aws s3 cp function.zip s3://highlight-lambda-code/ai-insights.zip && rm function.zip && yarn update
scripts.update: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ai-insights --s3-bucket highlight-lambda-code --s3-key ai-insights.zip > /dev/null && echo 'ai-insights lambda updated'
scripts.zip: zip -r function.zip node_modules package.json && cd dist && zip ../function.zip *.js && cd ..
